name: Finding Toasty
description: A very short game that was made in bitsy! You can download the .html if you just want to play it, or download the .bitsy file if you just want to check out how it was made. If you want to to open it up, go to https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy and copy and paste the text from the .bitsy file into the game data text. You can open the .bitsy file with any text editor.
